headline: Could Lower Rates Unlock New Earnings Potential for Trade Desk (TTD) in Digital Advertising?
summary: Following recent comments from the New York Federal Reserve President, anticipation of a potential December interest rate cut has grown, benefiting growth-focused software companies including The Trade Desk. This shift in expectations has bolstered sentiment in the software sector, highlighting increased investor optimism about earnings potential amid lower borrowing costs. We'll examine how interest rate cut hopes may shape The Trade Desk's outlook given its role in growth-oriented digital...
